law.catch_line: Subject to the availability of funds, the Governor shall include in the State budget for fiscal year...
law.text:
Subject to the availability of funds, the Governor shall include in the State budget for fiscal year 2002 and all succeeding fiscal years sufficient funds to ensure that:
each at-risk parent receives substance abuse treatment when the at-risk parent indicates a desire to enter substance abuse treatment or as soon thereafter as possible; and
each child of an at-risk parent receives necessary treatment to remediate the harm caused by the parent's substance abuse.
